glm_add_vec4
glm_vec4 glm_add_vec4(
glm_vec4 x,
glm_vec4 y
)

Add x and y.

Parameters
x
glm_vec4

The left operand.

y
glm_vec4

The right operand.

Returns

Returns the sum of x and y

glm_min_vec4
glm_vec4 glm_min_vec4(
glm_vec4 x,
glm_vec4 y
)

Returns the minimum of x and y.

Parameters
x
glm_vec4

The left operand.

y
glm_vec4

The right operand.

Returns

Returns y if x > y; otherwise it returns x.

glm_max_vec4
glm_vec4 glm_max_vec4(
glm_vec4 x,
glm_vec4 y
)

Returns the maximum of x and y.

Parameters
x
glm_vec4

The left operand.

y
glm_vec4

The right operand.

Returns

Returns y if x < y; otherwise it returns x.

glm_clamp_vec4
glm_vec4 glm_clamp_vec4(
glm_vec4 x,
glm_vec4 minVal,
glm_vec4 maxVal
)

Clamps x between minVal and maxVal.

Parameters
x
glm_vec4

The left operand.

y

The right operand.

Returns

Returns min(max(x, minVal), maxVal). Results are undefined if minVal > maxVal.

glm_mix_vec4
glm_vec4 glm_mix_vec4(
glm_vec4 x,

float a
)

Linearly interpolates between two values.

Parameters
x
glm_vec4

The first value.

y
glm_vec4

The second value.

a
float

The interpolation value.

Returns

Returns the linear blend of x and y.

glm_length_vec4
float glm_length_vec4(
glm_vec4 x
)
Parameters
x
glm_vec4

The vector.

Returns

A vector in the same direction as x but with a length of 1.

glm_vec4

Returns

glm_reflect_vec4
glm_vec4 glm_reflect_vec4(
glm_vec4 I,
glm_vec4 N
)

For the incident vector I and surface orientation N, returns the reflection direction.  N must already be normalized in order to achieve the desired result.

Parameters
I
glm_vec4

The incident vector.

N
glm_vec4

The surface orientation.

Returns

The reflected direction.

glm_refract_vec4
glm_vec4 glm_refract_vec4(
glm_vec4 I,
glm_vec4 N,
float eta
)

For the incident vector I and surface normal N, and the ratio of indices of refraction eta, return the refraction vector.  The result is computed by the refraction equation.

Parameters
I
glm_vec4

Incident vector.

N
glm_vec4

Surface normal.

eta
float

The ratio of indices of refraction.

Returns

The refracted direction.
